name: open-draw
description: Virtual whiteboard for sketching hand-drawn like diagrams

scripts.integrate: pnpm run upgrade:package-manager && pnpm run upgrade:libs && pnpm run prettier && pnpm run lint:fix && pnpm run build && pnpm run bump:version
scripts.upgrade:libs: pnpm up --latest && pnpm install @excalidraw/excalidraw@next && pnpm run import:fonts
scripts.upgrade:package-manager: node -e "import { readFileSync, writeFileSync } from 'fs'; const packageJson=JSON.parse(readFileSync('package.json')); packageJson.packageManager='pnpm@' + packageJson.devDependencies.pnpm.replace(/^[~^]/, ''); writeFileSync('package.json',JSON.stringify(packageJson,null,2));"
scripts.bump:version: node -e "import { readFileSync, writeFileSync } from 'fs'; const packageJson=JSON.parse(readFileSync('package.json')); packageJson.version=new Date().toISOString().split('T')[0].replace(/-/g, '.'); writeFileSync('package.json',JSON.stringify(packageJson,null,2));"
